messages.title: Labour blocks more police on our streets
messages.content: Labour councillors vote to stop 24 more police officers being deployed on our streets. Liberal Democrats have reacted with anger at Labour Police saying that the original 24-hour police cover was needed throughout Hornsey & Wood Green.

messages.title: Lib Dem victory on local tax freeze
messages.content: History was made this February, when Haringey Council TAX was frozen for the first time in the culmination of 28 months of Lib Dem campaigning.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats react with anger at Labour for blocking the deployment of 24 more police officers in the Hornsey & Wood Green area.
Liberal Democrats celebrate a historic victory in freezing the council tax, marking the culmination of a long campaign.
Liberal Democrats aim to help families across the country by delivering a Â£700 tax cut, which has the potential to help millions.

issues.economy: Lib Dem tax cuts to help families across the country
issues.governance: Lib Dem victory on local tax freeze

images.caption: Photos of Lynne Featherstone and other individuals engaging with community and local issues.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes the Liberal Democrats' commitment to local issues including policing and taxation, and it outlines their achievements. It criticizes the Labour party's decisions and efforts within the constituency of Hornsey & Wood Green.
